english.segment1: Its an uphill climb. But its all you know. So you spin your wheels. And dig your heels and down you go
english.segment2: So predictable. But its not your fault. How can you expect to do your best. When youre scared to fall
english.segment3: Cause the pain is real. But you will survive. Thats how you know youre alive
english.segment4: Cause its Okay Now, Hey Now. You can let go. Thats when you. Find out, Find out. Everybody knows. That there just. Aint no, Aint no. Easier way out. I know it might not look that way. But Youre gonna live to fight another day
english.segment5: Theres a place I know. Outside of town. Lets get out of here. Where all our fears dont hang around
english.segment6: Heres another chance. Take it while you can. Cause it sure wont last. Moves so fast. And its gone again
english.segment9: You wonder what you are made. Im telling you now. Youre gonna make somehow. What are you so afraid of.
